entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Whitby
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:14 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 09:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -11.8°C
Pressure: 99.5 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -22
Dewpoint: -15.6°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
